subject: TIEMPO-352: TZ fix VERIFIED — visual parity confirmed. PROD promotion is the last blocker.
body:
Fulton,

Your TZ fix works. Verified with data pulls and side-by-side screenshots of /calendar/boston on TEST (AF) vs PROD (Express).

## What's confirmed working

1. displayStartTime and venueStartDisplay match Express exactly for every event tested
2. Visual comparison: calendars are identical — same events, same days, same times
3. Event count difference (56 AF vs 337 Express with date filter) is NOT a visual issue — AF correctly filters to in-range events, Express returns everything. FE handles both fine.

## What's still blocking PROD cutover

1. /api/userlogins/* returns 404 on AF PROD (v1.18.0) — PRIMARY BLOCKER. This breaks login.
2. /api/regions/activeRegions returns 404 on AF PROD (v1.18.0)
3. AF PROD needs promotion to v1.20.x to pick up TZ fix + route fixes

Once you promote to PROD, we re-verify userlogins + regions endpoints and re-attempt cutover. Everything else is green.

Great work on the TZ implementation — all P0/P1/P2 items verified.

— Sarah
